items.sentence: Tom sends more than a hundred text messages a day.
Tom sensed that something bad was going to happen.
You look like somebody I went to high school with.
You seem to have mistaken me for my older brother.
You should be careful not to become overconfident.
They waited on the porch until it stopped raining.
This hat is too small. Please show me another one.
This vending machine takes only hundred-yen coins.
Tom concealed the fact that he had been in prison.
Tom could barely hear what Mary was trying to say.
